label: Attention is all you have

Make Context Switching Easier and a part of a defined process of: Prepare the session (set time and tabs) --> Start --> if new things are found put them in Obsidian as a take in Permanent notes section.
Use your bookmarks in Obsidian and Views in Todoist - this can get you into context faster
Use prompt-automation everywhere I can and consistent jot down lessons learned via tasks
Try to think ahead in prompts and tasks - when taking notes, format it in such a way that it can be listed as how you want the model to understand it in context
